articles.title: Dr. Jon LaPook shares his experience getting the coronavirus vaccine - CBS News
articles.description: "Getting the vaccine felt exactly the same to me as getting a flu shot... No big deal." But then the emotional impact of the moment set in.
articles.content:
Since I'm a practicing physician at NYU Langone Health, today was my turn to get the Pfizer vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes COVID-19.
In addition to seeing patients in my office, I… [+4669 chars]
